bibl.title: I am fine!': Information about the Sender's Health in the Greek Private Letters of the Roman Period.
bibl.note: Suggests that the new form of the formula valetudinis that appears in Greek letters from the Roman period was influenced by Latin. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Delphine Nachtergaele, 'I am fine!': Information about the Sender's Health in the Greek Private Letters of the Roman Period.
Suggests that the new form of the formula valetudinis that appears in Greek letters from the Roman period was influenced by Latin. - Avec résumé en anglais.
